sense.name: (cause to) be frightened or anxious
sense.examples: Sudden noises scare her. She's very brave. She doesn't scare easily. He scared me out of my wits when he was driving so fast. Meeting new people scares me to death. She scared the living daylights out of me when she crept up behind me and shouted in my ear.

sense.name: (cause to) run from fright; expel by frightening
sense.examples: To be honest, I think that'd scare me off using it. Don't scare the new guys away with all your horror stories. We don't know what scared our toddler away from the baths she used to love.
